languages.text: {n}Калькасар бросает на вас острый взгляд.{/n} "Однако вы — не Леди Теодора. Пусть сложности, отягощавшие наши отношения, упокоятся с ней. Не советую вам забивать голову делами минувшего, не имеющими к вам никакого отношения. Теодора предпочла забыть об этом — последуйте ее примеру, и ваша судьба сложится хорошо".

{n}Calcazar gives you a sharp look.{/n} "However, you are not Lady Theodora. Let us put the difficulties that encumbered our relationship to rest along with her. I do not recommend troubling yourself with affairs of the past, for they have no bearing on your present position. Theodora chose to forget about this particular matter. Follow her example, and your fate will be the better for it."
languages.original_text: {n}Калькасар бросает на вас острый взгляд.{/n} "Однако вы — не Леди Теодора. Пусть сложности, отягощавшие наши отношения, упокоятся с ней. Не советую вам забивать голову делами минувшего, не имеющими к вам никакого отношения. Теодора предпочла забыть об этом — последуйте ее примеру, и ваша судьба сложится хорошо".

I do not recommend troubling yourself with affairs of the past that have no bearing on your present position. Theodora saw it preferable to forget about this particular matter. Follow her example, and your fate will be better for it."

I do not recommend troubling yourself with affairs of the past that have no bearing on your present position. Theodora saw it preferable to forget about this particular matter. Follow her example, and your fate will be better for it."

{n}Calcazar gives you a sharp look.{/n} "However, you are not Lady Theodora. Let us put the difficulties that encumbered our relationship to rest along with her. I do not recommend troubling yourself with affairs of the past, for they have no bearing on your present position. Theodora chose to forget about this particular matter. Follow her example, and your fate will be the better for it."

{n}Calcazar gives you a sharp look.{/n} "However, you are not Lady Theodora. Let us put the difficulties that encumbered our relationship to rest along with her. I do not recommend troubling yourself with affairs of the past, for they have no bearing on your present position. Theodora chose to forget about this particular matter. Follow her example, and your fate will be the better for it."

languages.text: {n}カルカサルがあなたを鋭い目で見る。{/n}「だが、あなたはシオドーラ女史ではない。我々の関係に対して重荷となる困難は、彼女とともに捨ててしまおうではないか。過去のことに煩わされるのはよくない。今のあなたの立場とは何ら関係がないのだから。シオドーラは、この特別な問題を忘れることを選んだ。彼女を見習うのだ。そうすれば、あなたの運命はより良いものとなるはずだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar gives you a sharp look.{/n} "However, you are not Lady Theodora. Let us put the difficulties that encumbered our relationship to rest along with her. I do not recommend troubling yourself with affairs of the past, for they have no bearing on your present position. Theodora chose to forget about this particular matter. Follow her example, and your fate will be the better for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルがあなたを鋭い目で見る。{/n}「だが、あなたはシオドーラ女史ではない。我々の関係に対して重荷となる困難は、彼女とともに捨ててしまおうではないか。過去のことに煩わされるのはよくない。今のあなたの立場とは何ら関係がないのだから。シオドーラは、この特別な問題を忘れることを選んだ。彼女を見習うのだ。そうすれば、あなたの運命はより良いものとなるはずだ」

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎以锐利的目光看着你。{/n}“不过，你并不是西奥多拉夫人，因此我们不妨暂且放下我们之间的龃龉。我建议你无需为过去的事情烦恼，因为这一切与你当下的处境毫无关系。西奥多拉生前也选择了放下那些事情，你可以效仿她的榜样。这样一来，你的命运也会变得更加光明。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar gives you a sharp look.{/n} "However, you are not Lady Theodora. Let us put the difficulties that encumbered our relationship to rest along with her. I do not recommend troubling yourself with affairs of the past, for they have no bearing on your present position. Theodora chose to forget about this particular matter. Follow her example, and your fate will be the better for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎以锐利的目光看着你。{/n}“不过，你并不是西奥多拉夫人，因此我们不妨暂且放下我们之间的龃龉。我建议你无需为过去的事情烦恼，因为这一切与你当下的处境毫无关系。西奥多拉生前也选择了放下那些事情，你可以效仿她的榜样。这样一来，你的命运也会变得更加光明。”

languages.text: {n}Calcazar vous adresse un regard perçant.{/n} « Cependant, vous n'êtes pas dame Théodora. Enterrons avec elle la hache de guerre qui nous sépare encore. Je vous conseille d'oublier ce qui appartient au passé, car tout cela n'importe que peu dans notre situation actuelle. Théodora avait choisi d'oublier ce problème en particulier. Suivez son exemple et vous n'aurez qu'à vous en féliciter. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar gives you a sharp look.{/n} "However, you are not Lady Theodora. Let us put the difficulties that encumbered our relationship to rest along with her. I do not recommend troubling yourself with affairs of the past, for they have no bearing on your present position. Theodora chose to forget about this particular matter. Follow her example, and your fate will be the better for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar vous adresse un regard perçant.{/n} « Cependant, vous n'êtes pas dame Théodora. Enterrons avec elle la hache de guerre qui nous sépare encore. Je vous conseille d'oublier ce qui appartient au passé, car tout cela n'importe que peu dans notre situation actuelle. Théodora avait choisi d'oublier ce problème en particulier. Suivez son exemple et vous n'aurez qu'à vous en féliciter. »

languages.text: {n}Calcazar te lanza una mirada cortante.{/n} «Sin embargo, usted no es lady Theodora. Dejemos a un lado las dificultades que lastraron nuestra relación y enterrémoslas con ella. No le recomiendo indagar en asuntos pasados que no tienen relación con su posición actual. Theodora eligió olvidar este asunto concreto. Siga su ejemplo y le irá mucho mejor».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar gives you a sharp look.{/n} "However, you are not Lady Theodora. Let us put the difficulties that encumbered our relationship to rest along with her. I do not recommend troubling yourself with affairs of the past, for they have no bearing on your present position. Theodora chose to forget about this particular matter. Follow her example, and your fate will be the better for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar te lanza una mirada cortante.{/n} «Sin embargo, usted no es lady Theodora. Dejemos a un lado las dificultades que lastraron nuestra relación y enterrémoslas con ella. No le recomiendo indagar en asuntos pasados que no tienen relación con su posición actual. Theodora eligió olvidar este asunto concreto. Siga su ejemplo y le irá mucho mejor».

languages.text: {n}Calcazar wirft dir einen scharfen Blick zu.{/n} "Allerdings seid Ihr nicht Lady Theodora. Lasst uns die Schwierigkeiten unserer Beziehung mit ihr begraben. Ihr solltet Euch nicht mit den Angelegenheit der Vergangenheit befassen, denn sie haben keine Auswirkung auf Eure jetzige Position. Theodora hatte beschlossen, diese Angelegenheit zu vergessen. Folgt Ihr ihrem Beispiel, kann Euer Schicksal nur davon profitieren."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar gives you a sharp look.{/n} "However, you are not Lady Theodora. Let us put the difficulties that encumbered our relationship to rest along with her. I do not recommend troubling yourself with affairs of the past, for they have no bearing on your present position. Theodora chose to forget about this particular matter. Follow her example, and your fate will be the better for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar wirft dir einen scharfen Blick zu.{/n} "Allerdings seid Ihr nicht Lady Theodora. Lasst uns die Schwierigkeiten unserer Beziehung mit ihr begraben. Ihr sollte Euch nicht mit den Angelegenheit der Vergangenheit befassen, denn sie haben keine Auswirkung auf Eure jetzige Position. Theodora hatte beschlossen, diese Angelegenheit vergessen. Folgt Ihr ihrem Beispiel, kann Euer Schicksal nur davon profitieren."

languages.text: {n}Calcazar sana keskin bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Sen Leydi Theodora değilsin. Onunla ilişkimizde yaşadığımız bazı zorluklar, kendisiyle birlikte huzur içinde uyusun. Geçmişteki sorunlarla kafanı yormamanı öneririm zira onların, mevcut konumuna herhangi bir etkisi yok. Theodora bu konuyu unutmayı seçti. Onun gibi yap ki seni daha iyi bir gelecek bekliyor olsun."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar gives you a sharp look.{/n} "However, you are not Lady Theodora. Let us put the difficulties that encumbered our relationship to rest along with her. I do not recommend troubling yourself with affairs of the past, for they have no bearing on your present position. Theodora chose to forget about this particular matter. Follow her example, and your fate will be the better for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar sana keskin bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Sen Leydi Theodora değilsin. Onunla olan ilişkimizde yaşadığımız bazı zorluklar, onunla birlikte huzur içinde uyusun. Geçmişteki sorunlarla canını sıkmamanı öneririm çünkü onların mevcut konumuna herhangi bir etkisi yok. Theodora bu konuyu unutmayı seçti. Onun gibi yap ve seni daha iyi bir gelecek bekliyor olsun."
